settings.account.description: Gestionar las opciones de tu cuenta
settings.account.referAFriend.descriptio: Comparte Nightlight con tus amigos y consigue recompensas especiales como una insignia, NCP y XP por sus registros!
settings.account.dangerousZone.descripti: Puedes solicitar la eliminación de tu cuenta. Será revisada por nosotros manualmente y eliminada en un plazo de un mes.Tu cuenta y todos los datos relacionada a ella será eliminada.
settings.customization.description: Cambia Nightlight como más te guste
settings.customization.language.descript: Elige en que idioma deseas tener Nightlight (Beta)
settings.customization.dataSaver.descrip: Carga fotos y gifs a baja calidad
settings.customization.autoplayProfileMu: Reproducción automática de la música del perfil
Reproduce automáticamente música en todos los perfiles
settings.customization.animatedFullscree: Desactivado, convertirá los banners animados en imágenes estáticas en vistas encontradas en pantalla completa on fullscreen views. (Can affect performance)
settings.privacy.description: Manage what others can see about you
settings.privacy.likedPosts.description: Other users can see posts you've liked on your profile
Let's you choose the default option for views visibility
item.profileMusic.description: Let your favorite song play for anyone visiting your profile!
item.profileAnimation.description: Make your profile pop! with a fresh welcome animation!
item.profileDecoration.description: Stand out with a unique decoration around your profile picture!
item.voicepack.description: Never feel alone again with voicepacks!
item.title: Title
item.title.description: I mean you gotta let them know
profile.posts.liked.status.mutuals: They have their liked posts limited to mutuals only. Follow each other to view them!
profile.posts.liked.status.off: They have their liked posts private.
profile.posts.commented.status.mutuals: They have their commented posts limited to mutuals only. Follow each other to view them!
profile.posts.commented.status.off: They have their commented posts private.
